Acceleor C Extension:
Tool to improve productivity of agents by helping them getting companies informations from the current page.
The tool is using the current url as input, and outputs infos for each company in a table, that is available for download.
The format of the table is user friendly.
This tool was created as a collaboration between ACCELEOR and PRF Development.
